updates.title: Caterpillar taps Nvidia to bring AI to its construction equipment
updates.description: Caterpillar is piloting Cat AI Assistant, a system of AI agents in one of its excavators built on Nvidia's physical AI platform.

updates.title: Keeping creativity flowing when times are tough
updates.description: Building a culture where everyone feels safe and encouraged to contribute is no small task. We are always interested in the ways teams use Figma to do just that—brainstorm, ideate, team-build—and it’s one of the many reasons we launched FigJam. Here, Senior Illustrator Alek Mackie shares how he stays creative and productive.

updates.title: Turn your prompts into visual assets and slide decks with the Figma app in ChatGPT
updates.description: We’re expanding the capabilities of the Figma app in ChatGPT, so you can turn your ideas into creative assets and presentations that you can polish in Figma Buzz and Figma Slides.

updates.title: Why this VC thinks 2026 will be ‘the year of the consumer’
updates.description: AI adoption in enterprise is stalling as companies don't know where to start. Vanessa Larco of Premise VC thinks 2026 will be the year of the consumer.
